mapper.select: SELECT categrpno, name, seqno, rdate, cnt FROM notice_categrp ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_categrp(categrpno, name, seqno, rdate, cnt) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(categrpno), 0) + 1 as categrpno FROM notice_categrp), #{name}, #{seqno}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_categrp SET seqno = seqno - 1 WHERE categrpno=#{categrpno} AND seqno != 1
